content:
# I successfully harvested 10 coal pieces, and my inventory now reflects this change.
# With coal in hand, I can now start to set up some basic automation.

# Next, I will look for a stone patch to gather some stone, which is essential for crafting.
stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)
print(f'Located stone position at: {stone_position}')

# Moving to the stone patch to collect some stone.
move_to(stone_position)  # Move towards stone
print("Moving to the stone patch...")
